doc.name: activatePalettes
doc.summary: Specifies whether palettes have the same appearance when active and inactive.

description.p: On Mac OS systems, inactive palettes have the same appearance as the frontmost palette. Use the activatePalettes property to control this behavior.
The activatePalettes property is true or false.
By default, the activatePalettes is true if LiveCode is running on a Mac OS system and false otherwise.
If the activatePalettes is true, all palettes look the same. If it is false, the active palette window looks different from the other palette windows.
